item.description:
About:
Women & Spirit in Business Café promotes café style conversations to:
• Remind women of their connection to Spirit
• Empower women to be bold in their vision
• Support women in building collaborative sustainable ventures

We hope to host regular events in the Amherst/Northampton area and beyond. Stay tuned for event announcements and join the conversation here online. Thanks!

4-6pm
Cost: $20 or sliding scale

Val Nelson, and Karen Ribeiro the second Women & Spirit in Business Café at the Nacul Center in Amherst

RSVP HERE

We gratefully thank Shalini Bahl for all her contributions to the organization and development of this effort. Entrepreneurial spirited women are encouraged to attend and also to connect with our Women & Spirit in Business Café Pioneer Valley Group on Facebook.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Women & Spirit in Business Café Meeting
